channel.title: [317] [PI] Transparent Comp Cape

item.title: [317] [PI] Transparent Comp Cape
item.dc:creator: @Andersmulle2 Andersmulle2
item.description:
@Andersmulle2 wrote:

My completionist cape makes the characters torso transparent from the front, I’m assuming it’s the ints that something is wrong with, i can’t figure out what though. Can anyone please help? :rolleyes:

case 19812:// Item id itemDef.modelid = 65270; itemDef.name = "Completionist cape"; itemDef.modelZoom = 1316; itemDef.modelRotationY = 252; itemDef.modelRotationX = 1020; itemDef.modelOffset1 = -1; itemDef.modelOffset2 = 24; itemDef.value = 5000000; itemDef.anInt165 = 65297; itemDef.anInt200 = 65316; itemDef.groundActions = new String[5]; itemDef.groundActions[2] = "Take"; itemDef.itemActions = new String[5]; itemDef.itemActions[1] = "Wear"; itemDef.itemActions[2] = "Customise"; itemDef.itemActions[3] = "Features"; itemDef.itemActions[4] = "Destroy"; itemDef.editedModelColor = new int[4]; itemDef.newModelColor = new int[4]; itemDef.editedModelColor[0] = -322; itemDef.editedModelColor[1] = -336; itemDef.editedModelColor[2] = -350; itemDef.editedModelColor[3] = -2541; itemDef.newModelColor[0] = -322; itemDef.newModelColor[1] = -336; itemDef.newModelColor[2] = -350; itemDef.newModelColor[3] = -2541; break;
